mapper.insert: insert into article (aid, title, art_describe, num_support, num_nonsupport, num_comment, content, customer_id) values (#{aid}, #{title}, #{artDescribe}, #{numSupport}, #{numNonsupport}, #{numComment}, #{content},#{customer.custId})
mapper.update: update article set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, art_describe = #{artDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num_support = #{numSupport,jdbcType=BIGINT}, num_nonsupport = #{numNonsupport,jdbcType=BIGINT}, num_comment = #{numComment,jdbcType=BIGINT}, customer_id = #{customer.cust_id}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where aid = #{aid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select aid, title, art_describe, num_support, num_nonsupport, num_comment, customer_id, content from article where aid = #{aid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
